TOASTED.toastDuration_hint: Duration in milliseconds for how long the toast message will be displayed.
TOASTED.toastPosition_hint: Position on the screen where the toast message will appear.
TOASTED.toastBgColor_hint: Background color of the toast message.
TOASTED.toastTextColor_hint: Text color of the toast message.
TOASTED.toastFontSize_hint: Font size of the toast message text.
TOASTED.toastShadow_hint: Enable or disable shadow for the toast message.
